title: Appu’s Hero
titlePrompt: Appu child and black Puppy playing in the garden
promptStyle: digital art, irina french, heraldo ortega, mandy jurgens golden ratio, art canvas, award winning, masterpiece trending on artstation 8 k 1 5 0 mpx
storylineTitle1: Once upon a time, there was a kid called Appu. He always liked to play in the garden.
storylinePrompt1: Appu child playing in the garden
storylineTitle2: One day he found an injured black puppy in the garden.
storylinePrompt2: Appu child finding an injured black puppy in the garden
storylineTitle3: Appu took good care of the puppy and the puppy got well soon. The puppy and Appu became very good friends.
storylinePrompt3: Appu child and black puppy becoming friends
storylineTitle4: One day while coming back from school, Appu fell into a deep hole
storylinePrompt4: Appu child fell into a hole
storylineTitle5: Everyone started looking for Appu. No one could find him. The puppy got sad and also went to find appu. After searching for a few hours the puppy finally found him and rescued Appu.
storylinePrompt5: Appu child rescued by black puppy
